kafka.zookeeper.label: ZooKeeper Quorum
kafka.zookeeper.description: Specify the ZooKeeper connection string. Example: host:2181,host2:2181,host3:2181. Either specify ZooKeeper quorum or broker list.

kafka.brokers.label: Kafka Brokers
kafka.brokers.description: Server names on which Kafka server is running. Kafka is run as a cluster comprised of one or more servers, each of which is called a broker. Either specify ZooKeeper connection string or this configuration.

kafka.partitions.label: Number of Partitions
kafka.partitions.description: Specifies the number of partitions. Each partition is an ordered, immutable sequence of messages that is continually appended to a commit log. The messages in the partitions are each assigned a sequential ID number called the offset that uniquely identifies a message within the partition.

kafka.topic.label: Topic
kafka.topic.description: Topic to be subscribed. Kafka maintains feeds of messages in categories called topics.

kafka.initial.offset.label: Start Offset
kafka.initial.offset.description: Specifies the start offset for processing from the queue.
